Hello, my name isbunnyguyand I'm a tinkering artist!

I like to make and play with all kinds of art: digital, traditional, and unconventionally programming and building electronics.


For the sake of the boring, corporate world, here's a more 'professional' version describing me:

Bunnyguy is a Viet-American artist and programmer based in America.
Previously an intern for Hack Club, Bunnyguy has previously contributed art for Counterspell, High Seas, and Highway/Undercity. Bunnyguy especially loves the games Mirror's Edge and Portal 2.

Sundial City, my personal website on the internet, is perpetually in a work-in-progress state. I hope you enjoy visiting my website!
